analyzed: cakkhunā a rūpa passati iti kathā
atthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti
nanu natthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Hañci natthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi no ca vata re vattabbe
atthi kāyassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti
nanu natthi kāyassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi iti

original: Hañci natthi kāyassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci natthi kāyassa āvaṭṭanā pe paṇidhi no ca vata re vattabbe
idha bhikkhave bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpam passati pe
tena hi cakkhunā rūpam passati pe
cakkhunā rūpam passati iti kathā niṭṭhitā

original: buddhassa bhagavato uccārapassāvo ativiya aññe gandhajāte adhiggaṇhāti,
analyzed: buddhassa bhagavataḥ uccāra passāvaḥ ativiya aññe gandha jāte adhiggaṇhāti
ekena ariya maggena cattāri sāmañña phalāni sacchikaroti
